Posts.EditableText:
Hello everyone. 

Seeing the tutorials, exist options in game that i don't have, i only have setup, features, display and interface. and i need more for exemple for activate a health options, but don't hace option for put scripts.

Hello everyone.

Posts.EditableText:
Hi, If you look at the top bar of your screen, you'll see 'File, Edit, Add, Tools, Help'
If you click on 'Tools' and de-select 'Simple Mode' you'll have full use of the other options available to you.
Posts.HTML:
Hi, If you look at the top bar of your screen, you'll see 'File, Edit, Add, Tools, Help'
If you click on 'Tools' and de-select 'Simple Mode' you'll have full use of the other options available to you.
